mapper.select: select * from MM_EVENT where EVENT_DATE >= sysdate order by event_date

select DISTINCT e.* from MM_EVENT e left join MM_HASHTAG_USE u on(e.EVENT_NUM = u.EVENT_NUM)
e.EVENT_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{dateStart,jdbcType=DATE} , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND e.EVENT_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{dateEnd,jdbcType=DATE} , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
e.EVENT_DATE >= sysdate
AND (upper(e.EVENT_TITLE) like upper(#{keyword}) OR upper(e.EVENT_CONTENT) like upper(#{keyword}) OR upper(e.EVENT_LOCATION) like upper(#{keyword}))
AND e.CATEGORY_NUM= #{category}
AND u.HASHTAG_NUM = #{hashtag}
order by e.EVENT_DATE

select DISTINCT e.* from MM_EVENT e WHERE
e.EVENT_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{dateStart,jdbcType=DATE} , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND e.EVENT_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{dateEnd,jdbcType=DATE} , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
order by e.event_date

select DISTINCT * from MM_EVENT e left join MM_CATEGORY C using(category_num) where upper(category_name) like upper(#{category})
AND e.EVENT_DATE >= sysdate
order by e.EVENT_DATE
select count(*) from MM_EVENT_ATTENDEE where EVENT_NUM = #{event_num}
select * from MM_USER where USER_NUM in ( select USER_NUM from MM_EVENT_ATTENDEE where EVENT_NUM = #{event_num})
mapper.insert: insert into mm_event values((select nvl(max(EVENT_NUM),0)+1 from mm_event), #{USER_NUM},#{CATEGORY_NUM},#{EVENT_TITLE},#{EVENT_CONTENT},#{EVENT_DATE},#{EVENT_TIME}, #{EVENT_LOCATION},#{EVENT_LAT},#{EVENT_LNG},#{EVENT_MAX}, #{EVENT_PRICE}, #{EVENT_SAVE}, #{EVENT_ORIGINAL})
mapper.select: select HASHTAG_NUM from MM_HASHTAG where HASHTAG_TITLE = #{tag}
mapper.insert: insert into MM_HASHTAG values((select nvl(max(HASHTAG_NUM),0)+1 from MM_HASHTAG), #{title})
mapper.select: select USER_NUM from MM_USER where USER_ID = #{id}
select count(USER_NUM) from MM_EVENT_ATTENDEE where EVENT_NUM = #{event}
